Package vibration

Provides the classes to carry out vibrational calculations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Band
    Provides the information of the vibrational band.
    BandProfile
    Utility class to obtain the vibrational spectrum.
    CoordinateData
    Data of vibrational coordinates.
    CoordProperty
    Calculates the properties of vibrational coordinates.
    LocalCoord
    Calculates the local coordinates.
    Localiza
    (Package private) Driver class for LocalCoord.
    LocalizaBoys
    (Package private) Driver class for Boys localization
    LocalizaPM
    (Package private) Driver class for Pipek&Mezey localization
    MolToVib
    Convert molecule data into CoordinateData.
    NormalCoord
    Calculates the normal coordinates.
    QXTransformer
    Provides transformation between Cartesian and vibrational coordinates.
    TransformCoord
    Transforms the vibrational coordinates.

Package vibration Description

Provides the classes to carry out vibrational calculations.
Since:
Sindo 3.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kiyoshi Yagi
